displayName.thai: ได้ด้วยตัวเอง 5x5

description.english: Complete a hard 5x5 level without using any help
description.german: Füllen Sie eine harte 5x5 Ebene ohne jede Hilfe mit
description.french: Terminer un niveau difficile 5x5 sans utiliser d'aide
description.italian: Completare una 5x5 livello difficile senza l'utilizzo di alcun aiuto
description.koreana: 어떤 도움을 사용하지 않고 하드 5x5 수준을 완료
description.spanish: Completar un 5x5 el nivel difícil sin necesidad de utilizar ningún tipo de ayuda
description.schinese: 完成硬5x5水平，而无需使用任何帮助
description.russian: Заполните жесткий 5x5 уровень без использования какой-либо помощи
description.thai: กรอกฮาร์ด 5x5 ระดับโดยไม่ต้องใช้ความช่วยเหลือใด ๆ
description.japanese: 任意の助けを用いることなく、ハード5x5レベルを完了する
description.polish: Ukończyć poziom hard 5x5 bez korzystania z pomocy
description.danish: Gennemfør en hård 5x5 niveau uden at bruge nogen form for hjælp
description.dutch: Vul een harde 5x5 niveau zonder gebruik van een hulp
description.norwegian: Fullfør en hard 5x5 nivå uten å bruke noen hjelp
description.turkish: herhangi bir yardım kullanmadan bir sabit 5x5 seviyesini tamamlayın
description.brazilian: Complete um nível 5x5 difícil sem o uso de qualquer ajuda
